    Installation¶

    Windows¶

    The easy way¶

    Most libraries are already included in these Python Scientific Distributions:

    1. Python(x,y)

    2. WinPython

    3. Anaconda

    You can start using it immediately after installing one of them (you only need to install one!).

    Recommended: WinPython 2.7 (32-bit)

    The hard way¶

    If you want to install Spyder directly, you need to follow these steps:

    1. Install the essential requirements:

      • The Python language

      • PyQt4

    Linux¶

    Dependencies¶

    • numpy

    • scipy

    • matplotlib

    • pytables >= 3.0

    • pymol >= 1.6

    • mdtraj

    • emcee

    • sympy

    • guiqwt

    MacOS X¶
